books.bDesc: The Whole Booke of Psalmes Collected into English Meeter, by T. Sternhold, I. Hopkins, and others.
1. The Cure of Cares.2. Contentment in Gods Gift.3. The Tribunall of the Conscience. Or, A treatise of Examination.

The Book of Common Prayer, And Administration of the Sacraments, And Other Rites and Ceremonies of the Church, According to the Use of The Church of England: Together with the Psalter or Psalms of David, Pointed as they are to be sung or said in Churches.
Fables with a Life of the Author, and embellished with a Plate to each Fable.
Engraved frontispiece in both volumes and 45 folding plates by Taraval after Vaxcillere.

The Experienc'd Angler, or Angling Improved.Engraved additional title by Vaughan, with contemporary or early hand-colouring. 10 engravings of fishes in the text.

The Works of the late Ingenious Mr. George Farquhar: Containing all his Letters, Poems, Essays, and Comedies Publish'd in his Life-time. The Comedies are Illustrated with Cuts representing the principal Scenes in each Play. The Second Edition.
